quoteText:
We may offer free or trial versions of the Cloud Services (“Free Services”) from time to time.
With respect to each such Free Service, we will make each such Free Service available to you free of charge until the earlier of (a) the end of the free trial period (if applicable) for which you registered to use the Free Service.
(b) the start date of your Subscription Term for the Paid Services version of such Free Service.
or (c) termination of the Free Service by Cloudflare in our sole discretion.
title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
